short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Matches LinkedIn profile tabs to a Buyer Persona

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the popup menu to set a buyer persona, then whenever you open a LinkedIn profile a popup will show up and check if the person matches your buyer persona
